text: The following is a list of episodes of the German television series R. I. S. – Die Sprache der Toten. As of February 7, 2008, 25 episodes have aired. ==Season 1 (2007)== Season 1 features 12 episodes. {| class="wikitable" width=100% |- ! Num. !! Title !!
